title: A Brief History Of Neptune Station
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[module CSS]]

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Teko:wght@300..700&display=swap');
@import url('http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/unfont/UnDinaru.css');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Space+Mono:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap');

@font-face {
    font-family: 'JalnanGothic';
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_231029@1.1/JalnanGothic.woff') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'KIMM_Bold';
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_2212@1.0/KIMM_Bold.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: 700;
    font-style: normal;
}

.box a, .box a:visited, .box a.newpage {
  color: unset;
  transition: color 0.2s;
  word-break: keep-all;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.box:hover a {
  color: var(--aclr);
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.box a:hover, .box a:visited:hover, .box a.newpage:hover,
.box a:hover span, .box a:visited:hover span, .box a.newpage:hover span {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.box a::before {
  content: "";
  display: inline-block;
  position: absolute;
  top: max(-10%, -15px);
  bottom: min(10%, 15px);
  left: 0;
  right: 100%;
  transition: right 0.2s;
  background: var(--abg);
  z-index: -1;
}

.box:hover a::before {
  right: 0;
  transition: right 0.2s;
}

span.goc a {
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.padder {
  padding: 5px 15px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.file-header th, .file-header td {
  text-align: center;
  padding: 10px 30px;
  word-break: keep-all;
}

.file-header th {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
}

.file-header td {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
}

.left {
  float: left;
  clear: unset !important;
  width: 300px;
  min-width: 50%;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.right {
  position: relative;
  float: right;
  clear: unset !important;
  width: 45%;
  min-width: 150px;
  max-width: 70% !important;
  padding-left: 85px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.right::before {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 3px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  letter-spacing: -1.2px;
}

.return::before {
  content: "- Return:";
}
.input::before {
  content: "- Input:";
}
.output::before {
  content: "- Output:";
}
.warning::before {
  content: "- Warning:";
}
.item::before {
  content: "- Item:";
}

.left p {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  letter-spacing: -1.2px;
}

.right p {
  word-break: break-all;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  letter-spacing: -1.2px;
}

.left p, .left span, .right:not(.filename) p, .right span {
  word-break: keep-all;
}

@media (min-width: 664px) {
  .longleft {
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**A Brief History Of Neptune Station**

**Author & Translator:** [[*user thd-glasses]]
**Translation Review:** [[*user Fluxman]]

**Used Fonts:**
# https://noonnu.cc/font_page/1254
# https://noonnu.cc/font_page/1068
# https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Teko
# https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Space+Mono
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; text-align: center; margin: min(4vw, 35px) 0;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]SEP. 29. 1998.[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(5vw, 40px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: -1px; line-height: min(0.5vw, 10px);"]]　The Foundation Times 　[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]Vol. 81011[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(9vw, 70px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic'; line-height: min(9vw, 70px); --abg: #999;"]][[[secure-facility-dossier-lunar-area-32|LUNAR AREA-32]]] _
COMPLETED[[/span]]

[[span style="font-size: min(3.2vw, 25px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic';"]]The First Moonbase In Human History...[[/span]]
[[span style="font-size: min(3.2vw, 25px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic';"]]Would It Be The Beginning Of The Space Era?[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box" style="position: relative; width: 85%; border: 7px double darkred; background: #F0F0FA; margin: 15px auto;"]]
[[div style="position: absolute; top: 10px; bottom: 10px; left: 0; right: 0; background: url('https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/goc-hub-page/GOC-Logo-v4.png') center / contain no-repeat; filter: opacity(0.15) grayscale(0.15);"]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="position: relative; width: 100%; padding: 0 15px; box-sizing: border-box; z-index: 5; --abg: rgba(100, 100, 255, 0.5);"]]
----
= [[span style="font-size: min(5vw, 40px); font-family: 'KIMM_Bold'; color: #1B569C;"]]**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goc-tale-sequence-farpoint PROJECT "FARPOINT"]**[[/span]]

[[span class="goc" style="font-size: min(2.3vw, 20px); word-break: keep-all; font-weight: 900;"]][[[goc-hub-page|PTOLEMY Division]]]'s Proposal About Construction Of The Outermost Stationary Base Of The Solar Sysyem, Utilizing Thaumatology, Astrophysics, Teleportation Theory, Extra-Terrestrial Architecture And Life-Support Equipment[[/span]]

[[span style="display: inline-block; font-size: min(2.3vw, 20px); word-break: keep-all; font-weight: 900; width: 100%; text-align: right; color: darkred; margin-top: 20px;"]]To] THE GLOBAL OCCULT COALITION _
HIGH COMMAND[[/span]]
~~~~
----

[[/div]]

^^The Special Advisor Of The Foundation Space Agency^^

[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; text-align: center; margin: min(4vw, 35px) 0 min(2.3vw, 20px) 0;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]JAN. 12. 2000.[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(5vw, 40px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: -1px; line-height: min(0.5vw, 10px);"]]　The Foundation Times 　[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]Vol. 81482[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; margin-bottom: 15px; display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-content: space-around;"]]

[[div style="width: 62%;"]]
= [[span style="font-size: min(9vw, 70px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic'; line-height: min(9vw, 70px);"]]NEXT IS[[/span]]
= [[span style="font-size: min(9vw, 70px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic'; line-height: min(9vw, 70px);"]]NEPTUNE[[/span]]
= [[span style="font-size: min(3.2vw, 25px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic';"]]Space Agency Recruit Team _
[[size 110%]]For Triton Orbital Station[[/size]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

= FOUNDATION PACIFIC COMMAND
----

[[/div]]

[[div style="position: absolute; top: 276px; left: -51px; width: 100%; height: 50px; border: 2px solid #664; border-bottom: 0; background: #CCB; margin: 15px auto; transform: rotate(-10deg);"]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="box" style="position: absolute; top: 130px; left: -15px; width: 100%; height: 400px; border: 2px solid #999; background: #FEFEFE; margin: 15px auto; transform: rotate(-3deg); --abg: #B01; --aclr: #FFF;"]]

----

**RANK:** Major

**UNIT:** Mobile Carrier Wing Chi-18

[[/div]]

[[div style="position: absolute; top: 150px; left: -30px; width: 110%; max-width: 110%; height: 300px; border: 2px solid #664; border-bottom: 0; background: #DDC; margin: 15px auto; transform: rotate(-3deg);"]]

[[div style="position: absolute; top: 50%; left:-2px; right: -2px; height: 200px; background: linear-gradient(#DDC, #FFF); border-left: 2px solid transparent; border-right: 2px solid transparent;  border-image: linear-gradient(#664, #FFF); border-image-slice: 1;"]]
[[/div]]

+ [[span style="background: #F0F0EA; padding: 15px; border-left: dotted; border-right: dotted; border-top: solid; border-bottom: solid; border-width: 3px; border-color: #DDC; font-size: min(5vw, 40px);"]]Tritonian Program Short List[[/span]]

[[div class="box" style="width: 100%; border: 5px double #EEE; background: #000; box-shadow: 0 0 5px #555; color: #FFF; margin: 15px auto;"]]

= [[span style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: min(3.6vw, 30px); color: #EEE;"]]TRITONIAN PROGRAM FLAGSHIP _
[[span style="font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: min(6vw, 50px); color: #EEE;"]]SCPS HIPPOCAMPUS[[/span]]
[[/span]]

[[image hippocampus.png style="filter: invert(100%);"]]

[[div style="width: 100%; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-around; margin-bottom: 30px; margin-left: -15px;"]]
[[div style="width: 340px; margin-bottom: -20px;"]]
* **MISSION:** Solar System Spaceship, _
　　　　　 Satellite Orbital Station
* **LENGTH:** 256m
* **CREW:** Total 6 Personnel, Several AICs
* **MODULES:** Total 8 Modules
* **EXTRAVEHICULAR ACTIVITY:** _
[[span style="display: inline-block; float: right;"]]EMU, "Shell" Lander[[/span]] _
[[span style="display: inline-block; clear: both;"]][[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="width: 340px; margin-bottom: -20px;"]]
* **POWER:** Type-U Nuclear Fission Reactor
* **PROPELLANT:** Liquid Kerosene
* **ESTIMATED LAUNCE DATE:** DEC. 2005.
* **ESTIMATED TRITON ARRIVAL DATE:** _
[[span style="display: inline-block; float: right;"]]FEB. 2020.[[/span]] _
[[span style="display: inline-block; clear: both;"]][[/span]]
* **ESTIMATED MISSION PERIOD:** _
[[span style="display: inline-block; float: right;"]]Semipermanent[[/span]] _
[[span style="display: inline-block; clear: both;"]][[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box" style="width: 98%; border: 5px double #999; background: #EEE; margin: 10px auto;"]]
[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; text-align: center; margin: min(4vw, 35px) 0;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]OCT. 1. 2006.[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(5vw, 40px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; font-weight: 900; letter-spacing: -1px; line-height: min(0.5vw, 10px);"]]　The Foundation Times 　[[/span]] [[span style="font-size: min(3.5vw, 25px); font-family: 'Teko', sans-serif; line-height: 0;"]]Vol. 83937[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="width: 100%; border-bottom: 1px solid #999; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(3.6vw, 29px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic'; letter-spacing: -0.5px;"]]WE SENT THE OUTERMOST SPACE STATION[[/span]]
[[span style="font-size: min(10vw, 80px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic'; line-height: min(14vw, 120px);"]]HIPPOCAMPUS _
[[size 170%]]SUCCESS[[/size]][[/span]]

[[div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-content: flex-start; padding: 15px;"]]
[[image launch.jpg style="width: 65%;"]]
[[div style="width: 35%;"]]
[[image tritonian.jpg style="margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[span style="font-size: min(1.6vw, 13px); line-height: min(3.6vw, 30px);"]]▲ **Commander Cpt. Clark** _
◀ **Launch of Hippocampus**[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[span style="font-size: min(3.2vw, 25px); font-family: 'JalnanGothic';"]]Successfully Launched From Lunar Area-32 _
And Completed The Moon Orbital Swingby... _
[[size 120%]]Fifteen Years To Neptune Via Jupiter[[/size]] _
FSA Said Support Programs Started Already[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="padder box" style="width: 100%; margin: 15px auto; border: 3px double #999; background: #FDF3F3; box-shadow: 0 0 2px #777;"]]

**Special Inspector Neil Armstrong**
-- Yes. The Tritonian program has been progressed by no urgent necessity, except keeping the hegemony over the space frontier from the rival groups. And General Bowe, who insisted on the fight for this hegemony, has no more influence over Space Agency now. The Agency reconsidered matters in this condition, and the result is: There isn't any profit to the Foundation from continuing the program. The Foundation is an organization to protect normalcy and humanity, not to colonize space.
@@ @@
**Hearing Commissioner**
-- Then, inspector Armstrong, do you think the Tritonian program have to be completely scrapped?
@@ @@
**Special Inspector Neil Armstrong**
-- As soon as possible. The Foundation cannot sent the spaceships to Neptune anymore. It means the crew of Hippocampus must sail back to Earth, right now. This is the last chance, they will run out of fuel after they entered the Jupiter swingby course. We have to take the chance to save them now, or else we'll miss it.

[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div class="box padder" style="width: 95%; margin: 15px auto; border: 5px double #0C0; background: #333; box-shadow: 0 0 3px #050; font-family: "Space Mono", "Nanum Gothic Coding", monospace; color: #0C0; display: flex; justify-content: start; flex-wrap: wrap; padding: 15px;"]]
[[div_ style="width: 120px; color: #FFF;"]]
**SCPF SPCOM** ∣
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: calc(100% - 120px); word-break: keep-all; color: #FFF;"]]
--Thus the Tritonian program support plans are completely canceled.
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: 120px; color: #FFF;"]]
**SCPF SPCOM** ∣
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: calc(100% - 120px); word-break: keep-all; color: #FFF;"]]
I'm sorry to inform you this news. Over.
[[/div]]
[[div style="width: 100%; height: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: 120px;"]]
**SCPS HIPPO** ∣
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: calc(100% - 120px); word-break: keep-all;"]]
//(Silence)//
[[/div]]
[[div style="width: 100%; height: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: 120px;"]]
**SCPS HIPPO** ∣
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: calc(100% - 120px); word-break: keep-all;"]]
//Roger. Understood about the decision.//
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: 120px;"]]
**SCPS HIPPO** ∣
[[/div]]
[[div_ style="width: calc(100% - 120px); word-break: keep-all;"]]
//But I hoped you to bring it before the Jupiter swingby. Over.//
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div_ class="box padder" style="width: 100%; max-width: 600px; margin: 15px auto; border: 3px solid #99D; background: #F5F5FD; color: #44D; font-family: "Space Mono", "Nanum Gothic Coding", monospace;"]]
